title: "New Orleans facial recognition tool mostly used against Black suspects"
excerpt: "Facial recognition technology has long been controversial. The city of New Orleans previously had banned the use of facial recognition software, which went into effect in 2020 following the death of George Floyd. Then, in 2022, the city reversed course, allowing it to be used."
